title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 365 - Regulated Medical Waste and Other Infectious Wastes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 365 - Regulated Medical Waste and Other Infectious Wastes

State Regulations

Subpart 365-1 - RMW Generators (§ 365-1.1 to 365-1.2)

Subpart 365-2 - RMW Treatment, Storage, and Transfer Facilities (§ 365-2.1 to 365-2.8)

Subpart 365-3 - Other Infectious Wastes (§ 365-3.1 to 365-3.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 365

Amended

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law
§§ 1-0101, 3-0301, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0306, titles 1, 7, and 15 of
article 27, title 1 of article 70, and titles 27, 35, 40, 44 of article
71. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
